job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongSatellite Biosciencesstrongnbspis pioneering the development and implementation of proprietary offtheshelf implantable satellite organs as living therapeutic solutions that can transform the lives of millions of patients who suffer from serious diseasesnbspnbspBuilding on 25 years of work in awardwinning labsnbspat top academic institutions the platform is supported by a strong IP portfolio and is backed by a top tier syndicate led by Polaris PartnersppbrppWe are seeking an experienced creative and motivatednbspstrongData Scientiststrongnbspto join our rapidly growing team In this role you will contribute to the companys platform technology of engineered satellite organs Specifically you will contribute towards our efforts to characterize and optimize the satellite organs using data driven approaches and modeling techniques such as unsupervised and supervised machine learningppbrppThis role is a unique opportunity to join an earlystage wellfunded Biotech startup You will report directly to our Senior Data Scientist The position is full time and offers flexibility for working remotelyppbrppstrongemResponsibilitiesemstrongpulliWrangle data of multiomic datasets and images in preparation for algorithm development and machine learningliliEvaluate open access databases of sequencing results for disease modelingliliDevelop 2D and 3D image analysis algorithmsliliParse sequencing results and use unsupervised semisupervised and machine learning techniques for outcomes predictionliliAnalyze peptide and nucleic acid sequence data setsliliManage cloud relational databases of analysis outputs eg PostgreSQLliliConstruct and optimize code for machine learning algorithmsliliAssist in using convolutional neural networks with and without transfer learning techniques to develop prediction algorithmsliliSupport running statistical hypothesis tests and generate power curvesliulpbrppstrongemRequired Qualifications amp ExperiencenbspemstrongpulliBS MS or PhD in a quantitative disciplinelilinbsp0 to 5 years of experience in the biotechnology industryliliProficiency with Python or JulialiliCompetency with data wrangling from imaging and tabular data eg pandasliliExperience with machine learning and at least one deep learning library eg Tensorflow PyTorch MXNet Flux a plusliliUnderstanding of statistical hypothesis testing with multifactor and multilevel datasets a plusnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspliliExperience with at least one of the followingliulp         Imaging analysis and algorithm developmentpp         RNASeq datasets and analysispp         Machine learning and convolutional neural networkspp         Histology imagespulliExperience preferred but not required Linux and Git AWS or other cloud computing platformsliliPossessesnbspdocumentation skills and attention to detaillilinbspExcellent communication presentation collaboration timemanagement and organizational skills are requirednbspnbspliliThe successful candidate will be an ambitious selfstarter have a strong work ethic be able to generate high quality work under tight deadlines and enjoy working in a fastpaced team environmentnbspnbspliul
